targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "Aktuell" as "type",
  dcPowerPV AS "PV",
  BatPowerLaden AS "Bat Laden",
  if (BatPowerladen>0 AND EinspeisenPower>5300,BatPowerladen,if(EinspeisenPower+BatPowerladen>5300,EinspeisenPower+BatPowerladen-5300,0)) AS "Bat Laden (frei)",
  BatPowerEntladen AS "Bat",
  acPower AS "WR",
  EinspeisenPower AS "Einspeisen",
  BatStateOfCharge AS "Bat Status",
  AktHomeConsumption AS "Hausverbrauch",
  AktHomeConsumptionSolar AS "Hausverbrauch PV",
  AktHomeConsumptionBat AS "Hausverbrauch Bat",
  AktHomeConsumptionGrid AS "Hausverbrauch Netz"
FROM WR_Daten
ORDER BY ID DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT
  "Sum (heute)" as "type",
  Date_format(TIMESTAMP,'%Y-%m-%d') as "Datum",
  sum(PV_kWh) AS "PV",
  sum(BatLaden_kWh) AS "Bat Laden",
  sum(BatLaden_frei_kWh) AS "Bat Laden (frei)",
  sum(BatEntladen_kWh) AS "Bat",
  sum(ac_kWh) AS "WR",
  sum(Einspeisen_kWh) AS "Einspeisen",
  sum(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch",
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch PV",
  sum(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Bat",
  sum(HomeConsumptionGrid_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Netz"
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  to_days(TIMESTAMP)=to_days(FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochTo()))
union all
SELECT
  "Sum (gestern)" as "type",
  Date_format(TIMESTAMP,'%Y-%m-%d') as "Datum",
  sum(PV_kWh) AS "PV",
  sum(BatLaden_kWh) AS "Bat Laden",
  sum(BatLaden_frei_kWh) AS "Bat Laden (frei)",
  sum(BatEntladen_kWh) AS "Bat",
  sum(ac_kWh) AS "WR",
  sum(Einspeisen_kWh) AS "Einspeisen",
  sum(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch",
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch PV",
  sum(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Bat",
  sum(HomeConsumptionGrid_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Netz"
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  to_days(TIMESTAMP)=to_days(FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochFrom()))

SELECT
  time_sec,
  avg(dcPowerPV) AS "PV Power",
  avg(BatPowerEntLaden) AS "Bat Power",
  avg(acPower) AS WR,
  -avg(BatPowerLaden) AS "Bat Laden",
  avg(EinspeisenPower) AS Einspeisen,
  sum(AktHomeConsumptionSolar+AktHomeConsumptionBat)/sum(acPower) AS Eigenverbrauchsanteil
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY time_sec DIV 300

SELECT
  time_sec-1800 AS "time",
  DCsim as value,
  "Prognose" as metric
FROM DWD_SIM_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec-1800)
ORDER BY time_sec

SELECT
  $__unixEpochFrom()+hour(TIMESTAMP)*3600+minute(TIMESTAMP)*60 as time_sec,
  convert(date(TIMESTAMP),char) AS metric,
  avg(dcPowerPV) AS value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  TIMESTAMP Between TIMESTAMP(Date_format($__timeFrom(),"%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00")) AND TIMESTAMP(Date_format($__timeTo(),"%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59"))
GROUP BY time_sec DIV 120

SELECT
  $__unixEpochFrom()+hour(TIMESTAMP)*3600+minute(TIMESTAMP)*60 as time_sec,
  convert(date(TIMESTAMP),char) AS metric,
  avg(acPower) AS value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  TIMESTAMP Between TIMESTAMP(Date_format($__timeFrom(),"%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00")) AND TIMESTAMP(Date_format($__timeTo(),"%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59"))
GROUP BY time_sec DIV 120

SELECT
  $__unixEpochFrom()+hour(TIMESTAMP)*3600+minute(TIMESTAMP)*60 as time_sec,
  convert(date(TIMESTAMP),char) AS metric,
  avg(EinspeisenPower) AS value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  TIMESTAMP Between TIMESTAMP(Date_format($__timeFrom(),"%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00")) AND TIMESTAMP(Date_format($__timeTo(),"%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59"))
GROUP BY time_sec DIV 120

SELECT
  time_sec AS "time",
  operatingStatus
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
ORDER BY time_sec

SELECT
Date_format(TIMESTAMP,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as "Time",
operatingStatus as StatusCode,
( Case operatingStatus
  When 0 then 'off'
  When 1 then 'anfahren'
  When 2 then 'Leerlauf'  
  When 3 then 'Einspeisen (MPP)'
  When 4 then 'abgeregelt'
  When 5 then 'Einspeisen'
  Else 'undefined'
  End) as Status
FROM (
    SELECT
        operatingStatus,time_sec,TIMESTAMP,
        @rn := CASE WHEN (@prev <> operatingStatus) THEN @rn+1 ELSE @rn END AS rn,
    	@prev := operatingStatus
    FROM (
        SELECT operatingStatus,time_sec,TIMESTAMP
        FROM WR_Daten
        WHERE $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
        ORDER BY ID ) AS a , 
        (SELECT @prev := -1, @rn := 0) AS vars 
) T1 Group BY rn ORDER BY `T1`.`time_sec` ASC

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "PV" AS metric,
  avg(AktHomeConsumptionSolar) AS value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY time_sec DIV 300

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "Batterie" AS metric,
  avg(AktHomeConsumptionBat) AS value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY time_sec DIV 300

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "Netz" AS metric,
  avg(AktHomeConsumptionGrid) AS value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY time_sec DIV 300

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "Gsamt" AS metric,
  avg(AktHomeConsumption) AS value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY time_sec DIV 300

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "Autarkie" AS metric,
  (avg(AktHomeConsumptionSolar)+avg(AktHomeConsumptionBat))/avg(AktHomeConsumption) AS value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec) AND AktHomeConsumption>0
GROUP BY time_sec DIV 300

SELECT
  time_sec,
  avg(BatPowerEntladen) AS Entladen,
  avg(BatPowerLaden) AS Laden,
  avg(BatStateOfCharge) AS Ladestand,
  avg(BatLaden_Frei) as "Laden frei"
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY time_sec DIV 300

SELECT
  "Sum (dieser Monat)" as "type",
  Date_format(TIMESTAMP,'%Y-%m') as "Datum",
  sum(PV_kWh) AS "PV",
  sum(BatLaden_kWh) AS "Bat Laden",
  sum(BatLaden_frei_kWh) AS "Bat Laden (frei)",
  sum(BatEntladen_kWh) AS "Bat",
  sum(ac_kWh) AS "WR",
  sum(Einspeisen_kWh) AS "Einspeisen",
  sum(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch",
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch PV",
  sum(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Bat",
  sum(HomeConsumptionGrid_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Netz"
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  year(TIMESTAMP)=year(FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochTo())) AND month(TIMESTAMP)=month(FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochTo()))
union all
SELECT
  "Sum (letzter Monat)" as "type",
  Date_format(TIMESTAMP,'%Y-%m') as "Datum",
  sum(PV_kWh) AS "PV",
  sum(BatLaden_kWh) AS "Bat Laden",
  sum(BatLaden_frei_kWh) AS "Bat Laden (frei)",
  sum(BatEntladen_kWh) AS "Bat",
  sum(ac_kWh) AS "WR",
  sum(Einspeisen_kWh) AS "Einspeisen",
  sum(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch",
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch PV",
  sum(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Bat",
  sum(HomeConsumptionGrid_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Netz"
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  year(TIMESTAMP)=year(Date_ADD(FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochTo()), interval -1 month)) AND month(TIMESTAMP)=month(Date_ADD(FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochTo()), interval -1 month))

SELECT
  time_sec,
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS PV,
  sum(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS Batterie,
  sum(Einspeisen_kWh) AS Einspeisen,
  sum(ac_kWh) AS "WR output",
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh+HomeConsumptionBat_kWh)/sum(ac_kWh) AS Eigenverbrauchsanteil,
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh+HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS Eigenverbrauch
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY to_days(TIMESTAMP)

SELECT
  time_sec,
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS PV,
  sum(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS Batterie,
  sum(HomeConsumptionGrid_kWh) AS Netz,
  sum(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS Gesamt,
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh+HomeConsumptionBat_kWh)/sum(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS Autarkie
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY to_days(TIMESTAMP)

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "Ladestand" AS metric,
  avg(BatStateOfCharge) AS value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY time_sec DIV 300

SELECT
  "Sum (dieses Jahr)" as "type",
  year(TIMESTAMP) as "Datum",
  sum(PV_kWh) AS "PV",
  sum(BatLaden_kWh) AS "Bat Laden",
  sum(BatLaden_frei_kWh) AS "Bat Laden (frei)",
  sum(BatEntladen_kWh) AS "Bat",
  sum(ac_kWh) AS "WR",
  sum(Einspeisen_kWh) AS "Einspeisen",
  sum(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch",
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch PV",
  sum(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Bat",
  sum(HomeConsumptionGrid_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Netz"
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  year(TIMESTAMP)=year(FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochTo()))
union all
SELECT
  "Sum (letztes Jahr)" as "type",
  year(TIMESTAMP) as "Datum",
  sum(PV_kWh) AS "PV",
  sum(BatLaden_kWh) AS "Bat Laden",
  sum(BatLaden_frei_kWh) AS "Bat Laden (frei)",
  sum(BatEntladen_kWh) AS "Bat",
  sum(ac_kWh) AS "WR",
  sum(Einspeisen_kWh) AS "Einspeisen",
  sum(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch",
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch PV",
  sum(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Bat",
  sum(HomeConsumptionGrid_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Netz"
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  year(TIMESTAMP)=year(Date_ADD(FROM_UNIXTIME($__unixEpochTo()), interval -1 year))

SELECT
  time_sec,
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS PV,
  sum(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS Batterie,
  sum(Einspeisen_kWh) AS Einspeisen,
  sum(ac_kWh) AS "WR output",
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh+HomeConsumptionBat_kWh)/sum(ac_kWh) AS Eigenverbrauchsanteil,
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh+HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS Eigenverbrauch
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY year(TIMESTAMP),month(TIMESTAMP)

SELECT
  time_sec,
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS PV,
  sum(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS Batterie,
  sum(HomeConsumptionGrid_kWh) AS Netz,
  sum(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS Gesamt,
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh+HomeConsumptionBat_kWh)/sum(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS Autarkie
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY year(TIMESTAMP), month(TIMESTAMP)

SELECT
  time_sec AS "time",
  max(ChargeCycles)-min(ChargeCycles) as value,
  "Lade Zyklen" as metrics
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY year(TIMESTAMP), month(TIMESTAMP)

SELECT
  time_sec AS "time",
  sum(BatLaden_kWh) as value,
  "Bat Laden" as metrics
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY year(TIMESTAMP), month(TIMESTAMP)

SELECT
  time_sec AS "time",
  sum(BatEntladen_kWh) as value,
  "Bat Entnahme" as metrics
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY year(TIMESTAMP), month(TIMESTAMP)

SELECT
  "Sum (overall)" as "type",
  Date_format(TIMESTAMP,'%Y-%m') as "Datum",
  sum(PV_kWh) AS "PV",
  sum(BatLaden_kWh) AS "Bat Laden",
  sum(BatLaden_frei_kWh) AS "Bat Laden (frei)",
  sum(BatEntladen_kWh) AS "Bat",
  sum(ac_kWh) AS "WR",
  sum(Einspeisen_kWh) AS "Einspeisen",
  sum(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch",
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch PV",
  sum(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Bat",
  sum(HomeConsumptionGrid_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Netz"
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily

SELECT
  time_sec,
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS PV,
  sum(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS Batterie,
  sum(Einspeisen_kWh) AS Einspeisen,
  sum(ac_kWh) AS "WR output",
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh+HomeConsumptionBat_kWh)/sum(ac_kWh) AS Eigenverbrauchsanteil,
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh+HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS Eigenverbrauch
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY year(TIMESTAMP)

SELECT
  time_sec,
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS PV,
  sum(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS Batterie,
  sum(HomeConsumptionGrid_kWh) AS Netz,
  sum(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS Gesamt,
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh+HomeConsumptionBat_kWh)/sum(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS Autarkie
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY year(TIMESTAMP)

SELECT
  time_sec,
  max(ChargeCycles)-min(ChargeCycles) as "Lade Zyklen",
  sum(BatLaden_kWh) as "Bat Laden",
  sum(BatEntladen_kWh) as "Bat Entnahme"
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY year(TIMESTAMP)
